800478233148784682.name: Slackers - Carts of Glory
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
When the drinks stop flowing and the city store's closing its doors, who are you gonna call to save the day? Come roll with our crew of laid-back slackers, ready to turn chaos into glory, and possibly not into a disaster!!!



Welcome in the wonderful and crazy world of Slackers!

Race solo or with your friends in one of the most reckless downhill rides ever! Discover and master the unpredictable and unique movements of a shopping cart, find your shortcuts, collecting drinks along the way to satisfy your thirst and push yourself to crazy speeds across 16 different tracks to reach the store before it closes!



KEY CONCEPT

- You can live the dream of racing on a shopping cart at crazy speeds (risk free)
- If you're afraid to do it alone, you can play with 3 friends online
- Collect the drinks along the track to refill the stamina
- The store is closing; you'd better hurry up!

THINGS TO REMEMBER ONCE YOU'RE IN THE CART:

- First of all: I'ts not a car.
- The cart has no brakes. (deal with it)
- The cart has no engine. (push and sweat to move).
- The cart has no seatbelts. (we all know how it's going to end)
- The cart has no steering wheel (good luck in taming the beast)
- Last but not least: IT'S NOT A CAR.
You can do it!

800478233148784682.short_description: Step into the wonderful world of Slackers! Picture this: you and your friends run out of drinks and the store is closing! Hop in a shopping cart, the ultimate eco-friendly marvel, master the art of riding an unpredictable beast, discover shortcuts as you pave your path to glory!
800478233148784682.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Hindi

movies.name: Slackers Carts of Glory - Date Reveal Trailer
Slackers Carts of Glory - Gameplay Trailer

content_descriptors.notes: Our game is a lighthearted and cartoonish downhill shopping cart racing experience. While the tone is fun and playful, please be aware that there are depictions of blood during crashes and the gameplay involves dangerous and risky driving scenarios. Additionally, although the word 'beer' is never explicitly mentioned, the drink used to recharge stamina might be interpreted as beer.

800478233148784682.name: Make Way
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord!


About the Game

Make Way is classic, top-down, multiplayer racing shifted up multiple gears.

Grab track pieces from a pick n mix menu and snap them together to build your first course. Dodge hazards, unleash weaponry, and avoid falling off the edge in a chaotic rush to the finish line, then bolt on new track pieces for the next round.

Scrap across ever-growing courses with increasingly perilous features until a winner is crowned before starting over with a brand-new course.

Build your course

Work together—or against one another—to quickly build tracks using a range of ridiculous pieces, including loops, seesaws, corkscrews, and even train crossings. Then add obstacles and power-ups. Ruin your friends’ race with a well-placed barrier or jettison them off the side of a curve with a crafty boost-pad.


Blow up the competition

Four racers jostle and shunt to cross checkpoints and reach the finish line. Obliterate opponents with a range of wacky weapons, including goo cannons and Tesla coils, but beware: each checkpoint acts as a respawn point and revenge is a dish best served via a giant mallet or rooftop-mounted shotgun…

Keep on truckin’

The finish line isn’t the finish! Add new track pieces after each round to create monstrously large courses, and score bonus points with your performance to take home the trophy.


Add to your collection

Unlock new track pieces and hazards for more dangerous course designs. Add new vehicles to your garage to romp to victory in style.

Key Features

  • Mix and match unique track pieces and hazards for near-endless course configurations
  • Fight for weapons and power-ups to gain the advantage
  • Unlock new track pieces and vehicles for wackier races
  • Up to four players, on the same screen or online with cross-platform multiplayer
  • Toggle traps and safety barriers on or off to make those twisty turns easier (or more perilous!) using fully customisable rulesets

800478233148784682.short_description: Speed around loops, dart through train crossings, drift around helter skelters, and unleash wacky weaponry in this modern take on classic top-down multiplayer racing games. The twist? You build the track.
800478233148784682.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
800478233148784682.reviews:

10/10 – GameGrin

“The perfect party racer”
4/5 – TechRadar Gaming

“Whether you’re having a gathering with your friends or arranging an online games night, make sure Make Way is top of your playlist”
8/10 – GameSpew

800478233148784682.name: Spacelines from the Far Out
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
CO-OP RETRO-FUTURISTIC SPACE AIRLINES


Spacelines from the Far Out is a ‘roguelike-like’ co-op management game about airlines in space, featuring unlockable spaceships, upgrades, characters and customizations, randomly-generated challenges, trips and itineraries, with a generous serving of 60s space-age flair and jazz!

A PROCEDURALLY-GENERATED SPACE TRIP


Never fly the same trip twice with our mighty Trip Generator, a system that constructs fresh campaigns with unique sets of routes, destinations, space hazards, ship emergencies and passenger events.

Alongside it, our game-balancing system Game Director AI monitors players' progress and performance through trips and dynamically controls game events in real time, allowing for a seamless transition from single to multiplayer!

A COSMIC HANDFUL OF NEEDY PASSENGERS


Each of your passengers are independent AI entities with their own needs and behaviors, dynamically responding to their environment and players' actions.

Be advised: if they don't approve of your service, you may get a visit from the dreaded Inspector, who will look for health and safety violations and shut your spaceline down!

BUILD THE PERFECT STARLINER


From helm to engines, each of your ship's 15 different systems can be upgraded to create the perfect space ride.

With tons of unlockable ships, you will be able to expand and create your own luxury star fleet!

YOUR VERY OWN CUSTOMIZED SPACELINE


By successfully completing flights, you will find lost parcels containing tons of unlockables for your company: from spaceline customizations such as logos and color schemes, to skins for your ships and new species of playable characters!

800478233148784682.name: LOCKDOWN Protocol
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
Lockdown Protocol is a first person social deduction game, combining real time action and communication, 3 to 8 players.

In this game, players have to work together to collaboratively complete tasks in time. While most players will do their best to complete this objective and ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try to stop them at all costs, without getting caught.

800478233148784682.name: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
DISCORD SERVER



About the Game

The Manager

The Manager is the office's ultimate authority figure, tasked with ensuring productivity and firing the Slackers hiding among the Specialists.

Slackers

The Slacker's goal is to goof off without getting caught. Whether it’s playing Minesweeper, or taking a dump, Slackers must blend in to avoid the Manager’s wrath.

Specialists

Specialists are the backbone of the company, assigned various tasks that keep the office running smoothly. But even the hardest workers know that productivity sometimes requires a coffee break.

Gameplay Mechanics

  • Objective-Based Gameplay: Specialists are tasked with completing objectives to contribute to the company's success, whereas Slackers engage in activities to appear busy while avoiding actual work.
  • Social Deduction and Strategy: Players utilize proximity voice chat for real-time discussions, alliances, and accusations, making social interactions crucial to gameplay.
  • Managerial Oversight: The Manager must observe, deduce, and decide who to fire, with each choice potentially altering the game's balance.
    Experience the Office Like Never Before:

800478233148784682.name: Goofy Gorillas
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
Welcome to Goofy Gorillas, the biggest nostalgia-driven virtual jungle gym!

Do you want to play your typical childhood games with your friends? Maybe you'd want to play Tag with Inflatable Hammers, or perhaps even a Boxing Glove to raise the stakes a little more? Why not turn your friends into enemies in a Deathmatch battle with all of the items mentioned? You and up to 9 other players can partake in these activities while also earning GP (Goofy Points). Levels are gained through earning GP, which can then be used to unlock unique cosmetic items to show off while you're winning in your game mode of choice!

If you just want to chill without the fear of being chased or you don't feel like turning your friends into enemies just yet, we have you covered! Goofy Gorillas prioritizes creating a social hub before any game mode begins, so you're able to do whatever you want to do - with small mini-games that can be played at any time too! While there's no gamemode active, you and your friends can play games in the games area that include Four in a Row and arcade machines.

Players can show off their speedrunning skills in the two different time trial events in all jungle gyms, with an in-game leaderboard showing off everyone's personal best times within that party!

Goofy Gorillas now also uses proximity voice chat, so you can truly immerse yourself with others by communicating in-game and sounding like you're really there!

THE GAMEMODES!

Deathmatch!
The standard of any multiplayer game. This is the perfect gamemode for those who want to mindlessly cause chaos with friends! Just spawn in with an item, get stuck in the brawl and come out on top, or just respawn with another item if you weren't successful! The first player to reach the score limit wins, or if no one reaches that, then the time limit will decide who becomes victorious!

Collectable items such as Stink Bombs and Banana Peels can be picked up around the venue and be used to fight off other players, or to simply catch others off guard. It's entirely up to you how you use them!


Infector!
Infector is another classic game. It plays just like Hide & Seek, but there's a catch... One player is chosen as the Infector, and by catching the Runners, they too will become an Infector. Once everyone has been caught, the Infector team will win... or lose if there's just a single player still standing. The runners will have nothing to defend themselves besides their ability to hide and run... unless they find a conveniently placed Stink Bomb or Banana Peel.

Be careful who you trust in this gamemode; once your "friend" has been caught, they will not be your friend anymore!


Infector: After Hours!
The Goofy Staff have gone home for the night, so the whole jungle gym will be in complete darkness. The Survivors will be equipped with glowsticks to help navigate around and the Infectors will be armed with flashlights, which are also designed to help navigate around, but they are also used to whack the Survivors! All of the rules from Infector apply in this gamemode too.

To make the experience just that little more creepy, nametags will not be visible above the players, so you'll have to be extra cautious around everyone you bump into!


King of the Castle!
A new addition to Goofy Gorillas. A randomly designated area will be highlighted in the jungle gym and the first player to find it must then stand their ground from opposing players. Should the King be dethroned, the next player will take their place and begin their reign. The longer the reign, the more points you get!


Tag, You're It!
A much requested game mode. The Tag that everyone knows so well is now here in Goofy Gorillas, except this time it's with Inflatable Hammers, Boxing Gloves and Goofy Guns! Everyone hides from the player that is chosen to be It. If they catch a player, they will both swap sides, and they will be the newly selected player to be It!

Every player is given a fixed amount of points, if they are It, their points will tick away! The only way to stop the points from falling is to tag a player. When a player loses all of their points, the match will end.


Juggernaut!
One player is selected at random to become the Juggernaut, who is given a little too much health and can withstand a lot of attacks. The rest of the players much attempt to take out the Juggernaut with all of the items before the timer ends. The Juggernaut only has access to Stink Bombs and Banana Peels in order to slip up the attackers.

THE JUNGLE GYMS!

Goofy Gorillas consists of two jungle gyms, both designed to offer different gameplay experiences.

Original.
This jungle gym is very large and is perfect for slower-paced gamemodes with lots of players involved. It features a soccer field, a basketball court, a mini-racing track, two ballpits, a bowling alley, lots of different slides and many, many hiding spots! If you want to get totally lost in a jungle gym, this is the right place to be!


Refurbished.
The Refurbished jungle gym is approximately half the size of the Original map and is designed for faster-paced gamemodes and is ideal for any party size! While it only features one ballpit and the soccer field, the compact structure of the jungle gym makes for fun and interesting engagements while partaking in the gamemodes!

800478233148784682.short_description: Goofy Gorillas is a casual PvP and sandbox game set in a jungle gym. Players are able to freely relive through their nostalgia in a simulated jungle gym and play with friends in the game modes included, such as Deathmatch, Tag, Infector, King of the Castle and Juggernaut!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: 8-core Intel or AMD, 3 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

800478233148784682.name: Pummel Party
800478233148784682.description: Pummel Party is a 4-8 player online and local-multiplayer party game. Pummel friends or AI using a wide array of absurd items in the board mode and compete to destroy friendships in the unique collection of minigames.

800478233148784682.name: Liar's Bar
800478233148784682.description: Dive into this multiplayer online experience set in a sketchy bar where the games are as dangerous as the patrons. Join a table of 4 and test your skills in Liar's Dice and Liar's Deck, where lying and bluffing are key to victory. Ready for a night at Liar's Bar?

800478233148784682.name: DUCKSIDE
800478233148784682.description: Imagine DayZ or Rust but you're a duck. A persistent world survival game with PVP, PVE, crafting, base building and hat wearing ducks, wielding weapons.

800478233148784682.name: West Hunt
800478233148784682.description: West Hunt is a 1-8 player social deduction game set in the Old West! Among the hardworking townsfolk hides an Outlaw or two causing mischief and mayhem across town. Luckily, there are eagle-eyed Sheriffs ready to sniff them out! No matter what role you play, you're sure to have a hog-killin' time!

800478233148784682.name: Backrooms: Escape Together
800478233148784682.description: A visually lifelike 1-6 player co-op survival horror made in Unreal Engine 5. Explore 7 procedurally generated levels that host liminal environments, puzzles, and entities with new levels and content added regularly. You are at the mercy of what's lurking and must do whatever it takes to escape.

841766737061740574.name: Furnish Master
841766737061740574.description: Furnish Master is a relaxing game about furnishing apartments, houses, commercial estate and even outdoor territory! Realize your design dreams!
